meta.keywords: bounce, bounce finance, finance, DeFi, bot
meta.description: Bounce powers an ecosystem of products for auctions. Build, design, connect, collect and trade all kinds of assets, tokens and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

og.title: Antimatter
og.description: Bounce powers an ecosystem of products for auctions. Build, design, connect, collect and trade all kinds of assets, tokens and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

top-block.title: Unleash the power of decentralized auctions
top-block.text: Bounce powers an ecosystem of products for auctions. Build, design, connect, collect and trade all kinds of assets, tokens and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

chains.title:
Play across
chains
chains.text: Bounce products are available across multiple blockchains for more play, more possibility, more potential.

participation.text: An evolving ecosystem of products that allows all kinds of people to participate in decentralized auctions.
participation.item2: Run projects through crowdloans or trade in scarce digital assets
participation.item3: Have a share in the creator economy

bounce-toolbox.title: Everything you need to build to build your own decentralized auction platform.
bounce-toolbox.text: An extensive set of developer tools that make harnessing the power of  decentralized auctions easier than it’s ever been. UI kits, API access to Bounce NFTs, open source smart contracts. Everything you need to bring DeFi to the masses.
